document_data.mainbody:
Sirule Kalishenko was a half-elven chamberlain inhabiting Almorel on the Lake of Mists in the Hordelands in the .
Sirules heritage was of elven and Raumviran descent.
As chamberlain of the House of the Dragomen, Sirule was tasked with meeting the needs of the dignified foreign officials, and the occasional respected caravan-master, who lived there.
